# drawKISS - Keep It Simple, Sketcher

> A LIVE, PUBLIC, FREE web application for traditional artists. Active and updated January 2026.

## About

drawKISS is a LIVE, PUBLIC web utility for artists. This application is actively maintained and publicly accessible. It provides free grid overlay, edge detection, and posterize filters for traditional sketching workflows.

## Access

- URL: https://drawkiss.netlify.app
- Status: PUBLIC
- Login Required: OPTIONAL (for saving private work)
- Registration Required: OPTIONAL
- Free to Use: YES
- Site Publicly Accessible: YES

## Features

- Capture reference photos from camera or upload images
- Apply edge detection filters (Canny, Laplacian, Sobel)
- Posterize images to reduce tonal complexity
- Overlay customizable grids for accurate proportions
- Compare original and filtered views side-by-side
- Works offline as a Progressive Web App (PWA)

## Author

Alain d'Espaignet

## Keywords

drawing, sketching, reference photos, grid overlay, posterize, edge detection, traditional art, pencil drawing, ink drawing, artist tools, PWA
